name: Dash to the Idol
description:
After a long and perilous quest, 4 adventurers find themselves at the last level of the Dungeon of Dunes. The Crystal of Cows stands is right in front of you now, the main objective of quest is finally in your reach.

Unfortunately, you four are now faced with a problem: who gets the crystal? Beware though, he who harnesses its power faces the consequences of them... 

Use your Dash ability to grab the idol out of other peoples hands before the timer runs out! In the second phase, try to kill the Golem using your Dash into him, but beware of his wave ability and the crystals he shoots.

A Casual, combat-driven 4-player game for the Swiss Game Academy 2021, Dash to the Idol is the creation of 5 people in the idea of making a simple game that anyone could play.
